function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases through contact-based tasks.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases such as pandemics.","Mitigation":"Implementing non-contact methods for completing tasks.","Technologies":"Spatialization, 5G technology (eMBB, URLLC, mMTC).","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential personnel.","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities."},{"Description":"Reliance on remote operations for on-site tasks.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of pandemic prevention and control measures.","Mitigation":"Ensuring that telemedicine and remote operations are reliable and efficient.","Technologies":"De-spatialization, 5G technology (eMBB, URLLC, mMTC).","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential personnel.","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities."}]}
